title: In solo que  promos, won one. but it says I won one and lost one even tho i only played one game?
body: I think this is dumb that i played one game and i win then its says i have lost one and won one. this needs to be fixed now i only have one chance to go to the next elo.

replies.body:
I looked at your match history to see if I could find out what happened with your solo q games. I was able to see that you did have other games played, one specifically that did end in a loss. 

If you want more context, you can always reach out to us in a ticket.
